text: Giovanni Paolo Gibertini, O.S.B. (4 May 1922 - 3 April 2020) was an Italian Prelate of Roman Catholic Church. He was born in Ciano d'Enza, Italy. He was ordained a priest on 12 August 1945. Gibertini was appointed bishop to the Diocese of Ales-Terralba on 23 March 1983 and ordained bishop on 25 April 1983.
